p: Overall, 10â€‰013 citations of interest were found in the initial electronic searches of the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials, PubMed/Medline, Embase, and PsycINFO, as well as a further 100 from other sources, including 91 from medRxiv. Of these, 282 full text papers were potentially relevant and assessed for eligibility ( fig 1). The full text of nine studies could not be found.
